pages.body:
# Proxies

A proxy is a website that you can reach using any web-capable device that runs a multi-user [[ZeroNet]] instance. *[Learn how to host one](/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1524212586_19H2XXg8jU9v8JstBejNbfAEaBNtMHgrtS#comment_220_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS)*. You can also install [[AWS Shadow Socks]].

There also is a website dedicated to listing proxies: [zeroproxies.bit](/zeroproxies.bit), but it is outdated.

## List of working proxies (they die fast)

- https://43110.cf/
- https://proxy.zeronet.a0z.ru/  (Adding new sites is disabled)
- https://www.zerogate.tk/ (Added zites are stored one day only)
- https://www.xiaopao.tk/
- https://taioan.tk/
- https://0net.io/
- http://raolmpedjrggms6t.onion (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])

## List of meta proxies

What's meta proxy? See [this post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1_1M4Ab8CUu3byziHVvNXLHmPezC4Lg9hvNJ)

- https://zero.acelewis.com/

## List of broken proxies

***These proxies do not work anymore.***
- https://zerocat.eu/
- http://cvhb5yx2qdclb76m.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])
- http://zero.heyitswither.tech
- https://bit.surf:43110/ (replacing https://bit.no.com:43110/)
- https://proxy.th3nd.com/
- https://zeronet.maxweiss.io/
- https://alilialili.ga/
- https://fuckcf.cf/ ((Qualys SSL Labs grade A+) + HSTS Preload, TLS 1.3 or QUIC)
- https://zn.maly.io/
- https://zeroml.ml/ (Can also proxy Freenet)
- https://zero.l0y.us/ (https://twitter.com/MagicInventor_/status/902944543485677568)
- http://zloyzl4o4pgjjuvt.onion (https://twitter.com/MagicInventor_/status/902944543485677568)
- https://zeronet.korso.win/ (FileServer Error, Certificate expired)
- https://proxy1.zeronet.functor.xyz/ or https://proxy1.zeronet.functor.xyz:10443/ (IPv4 and IPv6 with TLSv1.2 + modern FS ciphers only (Qualys SSL Labs grade A) + HSTS + secure cookies) (Certificate expired)
- https://zero.arukascloud.io/
- https://0netproxy.ml/
- https://0proxy.ml/
- https://proxy.th3nd.com/ ([proxy2](https://proxy2.th3nd.com/) \ [proxy3](https://proxy3.th3nd.com/) \ [proxy4](https://proxy4.th3nd.com/) \ [proxy5](https://proxy5.th3nd.com/)) 
- https://zeronet.iikb.org/
- http://zero.btnova.org/
- https://onlyzero.net/ (and https://onlyzero.net:43110/ )
- http://zerowrohotccypak.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])
- https://proxy1.zn.kindlyfire.me/ (http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:12_1FTFKztuv4Z5uy6iS83k9hB2xtS6yFnDxx/ZeroNet+proxy+proxy1+zn+kindlyfire+me+shutting+down)
- https://proxy2.zn.kindlyfire.me/
- http://wrewolf.com:43110/ (0.4.0, supports ZeroMe)
- http://proxy.zeroexpose.com/ (pron)
- http://zeroexposedcuclo.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])
- http://zero.pags.to:43110/
- https://zeroproxy.atomike.ninja/
- http://zerobit.io:43110/
- http://epdb6k6hj4rttycg.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])
- http://zeronet.crypt.cat:8080/
- https://www.zeropro.xyz/ (TLS certificate expired; removed on 2017-01-11; server down)
- http://wrewolf.com:43110/ (removed on 2017-01-11; 502 Bad Gateway from reverse nginx proxy)
- http://ampgb4cmyghof5rh.onion/ (Onion, only usable over [[Tor]])
- http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JpMNopRKejHPcu9QMa4RZ82zTDVQJXacy
- http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JpMNopRKejHPcu9QMa4RZ82zTDVQJXacy
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GWmQteFzMQpHyLjypL7dcC2BLSTurzQZs

# 近未来战争
- http://127.0.0.1:43110/19m4dnJQpjXUK8xLat6GjrSJiJdkj1F98f
- http://127.0.0.1:43110/12fMNZLqyjvLzj9YNCjbksv51eXSjjzzyZ

## ZeroNet proxy as dat://Hashbase

to proxy my zites
I make a [dat://](https://datproject.org/) site from zite's directory
then I archive it on [HashBase](https://hashbase.io)
so it became accessible from clearnet

# Proxies

There also is a website dedicated to listing proxies: [zeroproxies.bit](/zeroproxies.bit), but it is outdated.

# Proxies

A proxy is a website that you can reach using any web-capable device that runs a multi-user [[ZeroNet]] instance. *[Learn how to host one](/kindlyfire.bit/?Post:9:Running+a+ZeroProxy)*. You can also install [[AWS Shadow Socks]].

There also is a website dedicated to listing proxies: [zeroproxies.bit](/zeroproxies.bit), but it is outdated.

## List of working proxies (they die fast)

- https://proxy.zeronet.a0z.ru/  (Adding new sites is disabled)
- https://www.zerogate.tk/ (Adding new sites is disabled)
- https://www.zerocat.eu/ (Uses Coinhive to mitigate resource expenditures) - [Proxy rebuild update!](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1514096881_19WW28sn46rz9h15xf6NCELPdzxZ2YhbyB/www+zerocat+eu+Proxy+rebuild+update)

# List of Zites: Porn | [[zite-list-porn-talk|Talk]]

### Sites that provide porn.

* [Schizzi Schizo](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HrBGPB8Nippn5xNxua8ZuxE7hG7dWEnHW/) - Schizzi per una PornoGraphia Esistenziale

* [0chan Porn](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NZNtZQZHQRJXafvJpmY5jgqwRaCEZMsUc/) - Uses [[optional files]] to host images in these categories: Random, Hardcore, Gay, Lesbian, Hentai, Futanari, Fetish and Unpopular.

* [GIF Time/?RedditNsfwGifs](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Gif7PqWTzVWDQ42Mo7np3zXmGAo3DXc7h/?RedditNsfwGifs) - Non collaborative index of small and short sexual videos. Uses optional files.

* [Pix Image Albums/?TeenPix](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KwcosRj1dR2rnZUQWYAaMseD74ps3o44m/?TeenPix) - Non collaborative index of non-nude images of young girls. Uses optional files.

* [Chicas 123](http://127.0.0.1:43110/14TPbCCnG4tzPYmJLJgXUbdxyPrR7ef8pU/) - Non optional files image index of women. Not collaborative.

* [Porn2Peer.bit](http://127.0.0.1:43110/porn2peer.bit/) - HQ WEBM videos. Uses [[optional files]].

* [PORN2PEER](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AFUBsm13NrN7228bBe1UcqvcrCmYgUFLa) - for profit HQ porn provider.
